thread.title: Businessman settles defamation suit with former reporter - KBCI CBS 2
thread.title_full: Businessman settles defamation suit with former reporter - KBCI CBS 2 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KBCI CBS 2
title: Businessman settles defamation suit with former reporter - KBCI CBS 2
text:
One of Idaho's wealthiest people has reached a settlement with a reporter he sued for defamation after the reporter said on television that he faced threats when the businessman criticized his work covering child sexual abuse in the Boy Scouts. Peter Zuckerman apologized to businessman Frank VanderSloot, the CEO of health care products company Melaleuca, in an affidavit on Monday, the Post Register of Idaho Falls reported .
 KBCI CBS 2.
